We welcome you to %s!
You can now take part in the various services we have on offer for you. Some of these services include:
<li>Permanent Cart - Any products added to your online cart remain there until you remove them, or check them out. <li>Address Book - We can now deliver your products to another address other than yours! This is perfect to send birthday gifts direct to the birthday-person themselves. <li>Order History - View your history of purchases that you have made with us. <li>Products Reviews - Share your opinions on products with our other customers.
For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %s.

Enter the code in the Box bellow:

We have detected that your browser does not support cookies, or has set cookies to be disabled.

To continue shopping online, we encourage you to enable cookies on your browser.

For Internet Explorer browsers, please follow these instructions:
  1. Click on the Tools menubar, and select Internet Options
  2. Select the Security tab, and reset the security level to Medium
We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.

Please contact the store owner if you have any questions relating to this requirement, or to continue purchasing products offline.

We have detected that your browser has generated a different SSL Session ID used throughout our secure pages.

For security measures you will need to logon to your account again to continue shopping online.

Certain older browsers do not have the capability of generating a secure SSL Session ID automatically which we require. If you use such a browser, we recommend switching to another browser such as Microsoft Internet Explorer, Firefox, or Opera to continue your online shopping experience.

We have taken this measurement of security for your benefit, and apologize upfront if any inconveniences are caused.

Please contact the store owner if you have any questions relating to this requirement, or to continue purchasing products offline.
Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner.

Cookies must be enabled to purchase online on this store to embrace privacy and security related issues regarding your visit to this site.

By enabling cookie support on your browser, the communication between you and this site is strengthened to be certain it is you who are making transactions on your own behalf, and to prevent leakage of your privacy information.

We validate the SSL Session ID automatically generated by your browser on every secure page request made to this server.

This validation assures that it is you who is navigating on this site with your account and not somebody else.

Keywords may be separated by AND and/or OR statements for greater control of the search results.

For example, Microsoft AND mouse would generate a result set that contain both words. However, for mouse OR keyboard, the result set returned would contain both or either words.

Exact matches can be searched for by enclosing keywords in double-quotes.

For example, "notebook computer" would generate a result set which match the exact string.

Brackets can be used for further control on the result set.

For example, Microsoft and (keyboard or mouse or "visual basic").
At least one of the fields in the search form must be entered.

definition.email_content:
%%greeting_text%%



We welcome you to %%store_name%%!



You can now take part in the various services we have offer for you. Some of these services include:




  • Permanent Cart - Any products added to your online cart remain there until you remove them, or check them out.
  • Address Book - We can now deliver your products to another address other than yours! This is perfect to send birthday gifts direct to the birthday-person themselves.
  • Order History - View your history of purchases that you have made with us.
  • Products Reviews - Share your opinions on products with our other customers.

For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %%store_owner_email_address%%.



Note: This email address was given to us by one of our customers. If you did not signup to be a member, please send an email to the store owner.

A new password was requested from %%customer_ip_address%%.

Your new password to %%store_name%% is:

%%customer_password%%

For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %%store_owner_email_address%%.

Note: If you did not request this action via our password forgotten page, please notify the store owner as soon as possible.

definition.email_title: Your friend %%from_name%% has recommended this great product from %%store_name%%
definition.email_content:
Hi %%to_name%%!

Your friend, %%from_name%%, thought that you would be interested in %%product_name%% from %%store_name%%.

%%message%%

To view the product click on the link below or copy and paste the link into your web browser:

%%product_link%%

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_address%%

TomatoCart
------------------------------------------------------
Order Number: %%order_number%%
Detailed Invoice: %%invoice_link%%
Date Ordered: %%date_ordered%%

%%order_details%%

Delivery Address
------------------------------------------------------
%%delivery_address%%

Billing Address
------------------------------------------------------
%%billing_address%%

Order Status: %%order_status%%
------------------------------------------------------
%%order_comments%%

%%store_name%%
------------------------------------------------------
Order Number: %%order_number%%
Detailed Invoice: %%invoice_link%%
Date Ordered: %%date_ordered%%

Order Comment
------------------------------------------------------
%%order_comment%%

Order Status
------------------------------------------------------
New Status: %%new_order_status%%

Please reply to this e-mail if you have any questions regarding this order.

%%greeting_text%%

We welcome you to %%store_name%%.

You can now take part in the various services we have to offer you. Some of these services include:

* Permanent Shopping Cart - Any products added to your online shopping cart remain there until you purchase or remove them
* Address Book - Products can be delivered to any addresses you define in your address book! This is perfect to send gifts directly to the customers.
* Order History - The previous orders you have made can be viewed online.
* Product Reviews - Share opinions about products with other customers.

For help with any of our online services please email us at: %%store_owner_email_address%%
Please note: This account has been created for you by the store owner.

Please use your e-mail address with the following password as your login account: %%password%%

%%greeting_text%%

We noticed that during a visit to our store you placed the following item(s) in your shopping cart, but did not complete the transaction.

Shopping Cart Contents:

%%shopping_cart_contents%%

We are always interested in knowing what happened and if there was a reason that you decided not to purchase at this time. If you could be so kind as to let us know if you had any issues or concerns, we would appreciate it.

We are asking for feedback from you and others as to how we can help make your experience at %%store_name%% better.

PLEASE NOTE:

If you believe you completed your purchase and are wondering why it was not delivered, this email is an indication that your order was NOT completed, and that you have NOT been charged! Please return to the store in order to complete your order.

Our apologies if you already completed your purchase, we try not to send these messages in those cases, but sometimes it is hard for us to tell depending on individual circumstances.

Again, thank you for your time and consideration in helping us improve the %%store_name%%.

%%addtional_message%%

Sincerely,
%%store_name%%

definition.email_title: You have received a coupon from %%store_name%%
definition.email_content:
%%greeting_text%%

You have received a coupon from %%store_name%%. You can redeem this coupon during checkout. Just enter the code in the box provided, and click on the redeem button.

The coupon code is: %%coupon_code%%

Don't lose the coupon code, make sure to keep the code safe so you can benefit from this special offer.

%%addtional_message%%

definition.email_title: You have receive a store credit from administrator
definition.email_content:
%%greeting_text%%

The administrator has updated your store credits. Now you have %%customer_credits%% credits in your account.

definition.email_title: Your friend %%from_name%% want to share his wishlist from %%store_name%%
definition.email_content:
Hi!

Your friend %%from_name%% want to share his wishlist from %%store_name%%.

%%message%%

To view the wishlist click on the link below or copy and paste the link into your web browser:

%%wishlist_url%%

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_address%%

definition.email_title: You have received a gift certificate from %%recipient_name%%
definition.email_content:
Dear %%recipient_name%%,

You have received a gift certificate from %%sender_name%%. You can redeem this gift certificate during checkout. Just enter the code in the box provided, and click on the redeem button.

The gift certificate amount is %%gift_certificate_amount%% and the gift certificate code is: %%gift_certificate_code%%

Don't lose the gift certificate code and make sure to keep the code safe.

%%gift_certificate_message%%

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_owner_email_address%%

definition.email_title: The download link for %%downloadable_products%% is actived
definition.email_content:
Dear %%customer_name%%,

The download link for the products you purchased from store %%store_name%%:

%%downloadable_products%%

is actived.

Please go to the orders area of "My Account" and download the products.

%%download_link%%

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_owner_email_address%%

definition.email_title: A new credit slip is created for returned products
definition.email_content:
Dear %%customer_name%%,

A new credit slip is created for following returned products:

%%returned_products%%

from order %%order_number%%. The slip number is %%slip_number%% and the total amount is %%total_amount%%. You can print out the credit slip in the "My Acount" area.

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_owner_email_address%%

definition.email_title: New store credit is created for returned products
definition.email_content:
Dear %%customer_name%%,

New store credit is created for following returned products:

%%returned_products%%

from order %%order_number%%. The total amount is %%total_amount%% and the store credit is made to your billing account so that it can be used for future purchases.

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_owner_email_address%%

A new password was requested from %%admin_ip_address%%.

Your new password is:

%%admin_password%%

Regards,

%%store_name%%
%%store_owner_email_address%%
